comments.commentContent: Oh bro, this feature make us happy, because with this we can shorten our codes
Hi! Than,ks for this extension. Is it possible to set who can view a user's location map to the admin/moderators only?
this is related to the api itself, if you move the map around with the mouse will load fine everything. obtaining a google api key is not easy, so i will not change this one for now. ðŸ˜‰
well, i've noticed that and seems to be a bug not related to my extension, but i will investigate.
